Detailed Description

This class implements the constant value base class.

Member Function Documentation

void Moo::EffectConstantValue::fini (  )  [static]

EffectConstantValuePtr * Moo::EffectConstantValue::get ( const std::string &  identifier,
bool  createIfMissing = true 
) [static]

This method returns a pointer to a smartpointer to a EffectConstantValue, this is done so that the material can store the constant value pointer without having to worry about it changing.

Parameters:
identifier the name of the constant to get the value for
createIfMissing create a new constant mapping if one does not exist.
Returns:
pointer to a smartpointer to a constant value.
